description.value:
You ingest hallucinogens to expand your mind. Experimentation and study show you which ones will have the greatest effect. Your psychedelic forays put you into a different mental space from others, and normal people donâ€™t really understand you.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Wisdom

Bonus Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.azyo7xhfwdtjchtm]{Polypurpose Panacea} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.d4mp0m5xfnu9hbhn]{Mad Hallucination} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zk334ykycwiwb0gn]{Synesthesia} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.n0bsyxchnigkkuqo]{Confusion} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.82vi1xife3nlu8a0]{Mirage Arcana} (10th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.2ip53auf03bqxkl1]{Joyful Rapture} (12th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ni0okhagwuk0jbe9]{Waves of Ecstasy} (14th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xlzqpkl8fpm3sn4u]{Euphoric Tranquility} (16th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{Astral Projection} (18th).
